Description:
MAGNIFICENT FORESHORE LOCATION
Huge foreshore property, 963m2 (approx.) which has been divided onto two separate titles and offers a wonderful investment for the future.
The home is recently completed and all the hard work has been done. It offers some wonderful features including 3 bathrooms, triple garage (one being higher than normal for the boat or caravan), two living rooms, beautiful kitchen, 5 bedrooms (or four and a study).
This is a magnificent location; only a short walk to all Cowes shopping precinct has to offer and the property backs onto the Cowes North facing beach.
Beach Street, Cowes is one of the most prestigious locations on Phillip Island.
Available for private inspection.
Insights: 14 other 5 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
TITLED LOT WITH POTENTIAL BAY VIEWS
This 576 sqm (approx.) titled block is located in the Shoalhaven Estate with bay views achievable from a two storey home. Close to the centre of Cowes, the Penguin parade, GP Track and more importantly, Phillip island’s fantastic Red Rocks Beach.
All services are provided including underground power, town water, sewerage, footpaths, street lighting, cross overs and even recycled water for gardens. Located on the estates main tree lined promenade and close to the native reserve located in the estate. The fully fenced block is titled and ready to be built on, enquire today.
Insights: 4 Silverstone Drive, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Quality Investment Opportunity
Situated in the popular and convenient Seagrove Estate on a large 705 sqm (approx) allotment, is this modern 4 bedroom brick family home.
The single level dwelling boasts open plan kitchen, living and dining with tiled flooring - the kitchen is complemented by a large central island bench - perfect for entertaining, stone benchtops with waterfall edges, a walk in pantry, and stainless steel appliances including a 900mm cooktop and oven combo, and dishwasher. Furthermore there is a formal lounge/ theatre room at the front of the home, and a large rumpus room at the rear - a perfect space for the kids to play.
The spacious master suite is complete with walk in robe, and full ensuite with double vanities. The additional 3 bedrooms are all generous in size, and have built in robes.
Stepping outside you are greeted by an expansive undercover entertaining area, and fully fenced enclosed rear yard. The triple car garage has a raised roller door (perfect for boat or caravan storage) and has both internal and rear access.
Other features include: ducted gas heating, split system heating and cooling, high ceilings, and alarm system.
Also within easy walking distance to local school and shopping precinct - including great cafe's and restaurants - and only a 5 minute walk to the popular Cowes beach - the home is perfectly located.
This Cowes property is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Special Features: Self Contained bungalow
This home has it all and has been fully renovated; set on a large private allotment, this magnificent property offers 4 large bedrooms – 2 bathrooms and a large open plan living area with a new central kitchen. The main residence offers 3 bedrooms a large living space & bathroom with a large bath, undercover access to a large self – contained bungalow at the rear of the property is perfect for guest or teenage children. A large undercover deck is the perfect place to relax and enjoy a BBQ with family & friends.
The property is child and pet friendly both at the front and the rear. Have you have been looking for a home where you can move straight in? This definitely has to be one to inspect. The current owners are very house proud and you will be greeted with a very special property.

Description:
LUXURY TOWNHOUSE -FRONT UNIT
Located at the top end of Grandview grove for complete privacy but still within walking distance to local shops, school, and of course the BEACH! This is one of 4 units all with great neighbours, offering its own secure double garage and additional outside secure parking (room for your boat or caravan). Inside is a very generous open plan living with a full northerly aspect that flows right through the dining, kitchen and living areas. The outdoor living area also offers a full northerly aspect and is great undercover area to enjoy Phillip Island with your family and friends. The master bedroom is massive and has its own access to a full en suite, with 2 additional bedrooms, with internal access from your double garage. A must to put on your properties to inspect.

Description:
Easy To Live In, Easy To Let Out!
Located in the heart of Cowes, only a short stroll to the RSL, doctors, IGA, Cowes Primary School is this single level modern unit.
Comprising Spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area, two bedrooms and two bathrooms, the master is complete with ensuite.
With a host of additional features that include stainless steel cooking appliances, stone bench tops, central heating, polished timber floors, established low maintenance yard at the rear and single garage.
There is a lovely North facing undercover deck which flows off the main living area and would be perfect for those summer nights.
Set within a 163sqm approx allotment, this property would be ideal for holiday or permanent living.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
EXECUTIVE FORESHORE LIVING
This luxurious apartment is located directly opposite the foreshore beach and only a short stroll to the main restaurant and entertainment strip in Cowes.
Offering executive style living, this apartment is spread over one level and offers 3 spacious bedrooms, two bathrooms, stylish modern kitchen, and open plan living and dining space which extends onto a large balcony with views over the water to French Island.
The complex offers secure onsite undercover parking for one vehicle, and with the foreshore reserve, sandy beaches and children's park directly opposite, this is an outstanding property for permanent living or holiday enjoyment. Arrange your private inspection today.

Description:
FIRST TIME OFFERED!
First time offered in over 20 years!
Situated on an allotment of 602m2 (approx..) this brick veneer home is impeccably presented.
There are three generously sized bedrooms, all of them with built in robes, one bathroom with separate toilet and good sized laundry.
The open plan kitchen and living area is light filled, with glimpses out over Westernport Bay.
There is gas heating to the house, and there is also a further ducted inverter heating and cooling system that can be utilised.
The block is situated on the higher side of Red Rocks road; as such the potential to build up and have breathtaking views is a real opportunity.

Description:
Perfectly Positioned
This perfectly positioned home is located only 450 metres approx to the Cowes pristine north facing beach and with only 650 metres approx distance to the shops and all Cowes has to offer.
This fabulous 3 bedroom home offers character, comfort and position. The 3 bedrooms are all generous in size, with the master bedroom including full ensuite. The light filled formal lounge and adjacent kitchen/meals area form the heart of the home. The centralised family bathroom gives perfect access for the family or when entertaining.
Parquetry flooring and leadlight windows sets the standard high on this family home or a great weekender offering the ultimate Island lifestyle.
Sitting on a corner block, the fully fenced yard opens the options up for all your needs such as a caravan or boat.
Properties so close to the beach with this standard of finish are very rare to find, so do not miss this exciting opportunity!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Stunning in Design and Quality
Searching for a stunning, near new home in a highly sought after lifestyle location by the bay? Look no further - Introducing 9 Currawong Close, Cowes! Located in the prestigious Seagrove Estate and set on a 431sqm low maintenance secure block and less then 1km (approx) to the stunning, north facing Cowes beach and only 1.4km (approx) to the Cowes shopping precinct. Enjoy a lifestyle where the beach, cafés, schools, and public transport are all at your door step!
This outstanding home showcases 4 spacious bedrooms with built in robes and the family-sized central bathroom offering stylish and modern design. The generous master bedroom is complete with full ensuite and walk in robe. A modern, open plan kitchen offers a stone island bench and stainless steel appliances whilst the living area enjoys the natural North light and views out to the private outdoor sitting area! With luxurious upgrade features including high ceilings and doorways, stone benchtops, stylish floor tiles, floating floors , L.E.D Lighting, evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating and a 6 star energy rating,
Additional features of this seaside retreat include double lock up garage with direct access to a private rear yard with concrete entertaining area and an outdoor shower. With nothing to do but move in and relax and start enjoying your new beach home.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
A SPECTACULAR STATEMENT OF STYLE
Showcasing exceptional street appeal with landscaped low maintenance gardens, exposed aggregate drive and side access, this brand new, custom designed family home radiates elegance with modern charm.
The front of the home could be an ideal parent retreat with a stunning master bedroom & a generous walk in robe and ensuite. 2 further bedrooms offer ample built in storage and quality carpet. The full family bathroom features a large bath, and a separate powder room completes the accommodation side of the home.
The rear of the property opens up to an expansive family zone, which forms the hub of this spectacular home. Featuring timber detailing, light filled lounge, spacious dining area and magnificent entertainer's kitchen boasting a substantial kitchen bench, abundant cabinetry and stainless steel appliances. A sizeable walk-in pantry is hidden away which provides further storage & additional bench space. A large sliding door leads out to a fully covered entertaining deck and one of the best back yards you have ever seen!
The list of additional features is long & will surely satisfy the most fastidious of buyers:
- 4.5kw Solar Power System
- Reverse cycle air-conditioners
- Remote ceiling fans in all bedrooms
- Plantation shutters & Oakfield doors
- Side access for caravan, trailer or boat
- Aggregate drive way and paths surrounding the home
- NBN, Mains & Recycled Water.
- Second lounge or large study
This magnificent home is situated within the beautiful Whytesands Estate. A desirable location, Whytesands offers parks with BBQ, Flying fox, Soccer & basketball hoops great for the family to relax together.
Newly built homes of this calibre & charm are a rare find, so be sure to book your inspection today.

Description:
New Home With A Wow Factor
This brand new home will surprise you with it's neutral interior and well designed floor plan with a wow factor! Upon entering, be welcomed by a very spacious open floor plan including the main living and dining area with tiled flooring throughout, 3.4metre raked ceiling and a beautiful contemporary kitchen boasting stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops. Fabulous bifold doors from the kitchen, open out to a sunny north facing outdoor area creating an amazing indoor/outdoor entertaining space. A second living area with carpet throughout has sliding doors to a covered alfresco area overlooking the low maintenance landscaped garden.
Accommodation comprises three spacious bedrooms with the master featuring a walk in robe and ensuite with a double basin vanity while the other two bedrooms both have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom with double spa bath and a separate powder room.
Additional features include quality fixtures and fittings throughout, ample storage, split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans, dishwasher, 900mm wide stainless steel induction upright cooker, double garage with internal access with the added bonus of a rear roller door leading out to the back yard.
This stylish home, set on a fully fenced 560sqm approx landscaped allotment is only minutes to the beach and shops of Cowes and in close proximity to all that the Island has to offer. It is ideal for permanent/holiday living or as an investment property. Inspection will impress!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
THIS IS QUALITY
This magnificent townhouse is spread over three levels and offers great views.
From the moment you arrive, this home will impress you with it's exquisite design and feel.
The home features a formal entry with polished hardwood floors that extend throughout the ground floor. The large open plan living area has a fabulous kitchen with quality appliances.
The design of the living area allows for a large dining area and a living space that still has a cosy feel complete with Jet-master gas log fire and split system.
There are three bedrooms located on the second & third level and the master bedroom has en-suite and a rooftop deck which takes in views of the Bay and Peninsula.
This property offers everything you desire including a lower entertaining deck, extra large double garage and private rear yard that could house a boat/caravan or trailer.
In a highly desirable location only 200m to the beach and close to Cowes boat ramp and shopping precinct this home offers quality holiday or permanent living.
Vendor says sell, call now for your private inspection!

Description:
UNIQUE ENTERTAINER
Situated at the end of a quiet court, with an easy 10 min walk to beach and boat ramp and just a 2min drive to the main Street of Cowes. This much loved two storey/open plan home features light-filled spacious living areas. The award winning indigenous garden provides not only privacy from the road but is a haven for native birds. It also provides a shady place to relax on those hot summer days. A fully fenced property makes this an animal-friendly space.
The home takes advantage of a passive solar design, with louvre windows throughout providing cross-ventilation. The house is supplied by both rainwater tank and mains. The solar hot water system is a welcome bonus! The clever design means that the winter sun is fully embraced, but the summer sun is kept from directly hitting the windows and the double insulation takes care of the rest.
An entertainers delight, the large kitchen can accommodate many cooks at one time with ample bench space and plenty of room to move, the dining area can be extended by throwing open the French doors to the front deck, perfect for those summer barbeques and parties.
The large laundry has plenty of storage space and leads through to the rear garden where you can take advantage of the existing raised garden beds to grow your own fruit, vegetables and herbs. There is even a small chicken coop for those who love the idea of collecting your own eggs for your morning breakfast.
New bamboo flooring throughout the lounge area and a large wall of windows that really let the outside in, make it a lovely space in which to relax. And for the movie buffs, there is plenty of room for that big lounge suite and entertainment system.
On the second level, the king sized master bedroom boasts two private decks, built in robes and a sumptuous two person spa, making it a bedroom to truly ‘retreat’ to. Separated by a shared en-suite, the delightful king sized second bedroom can accommodate guests/extended family with ease.
This home exudes character and is refreshingly different from the rest. It has been regretfully offered up for sale and current owners are confident that the new owner will love this home as much as they do.
Phone enquiries - please quote property ID 18498

Description:
Those Lazy, Hazy Days Of Summer!
With lovely bay views across to Westernport is this double storey townhouse nestled at the rear in a boutique block of only 6. This fabulous family home is located only 300 metres approx. to the north facing bay beach of Cowes providing the perfect escape just in time for summer.
Downstairs comprises two bedrooms complete with built in robes, family bathroom, powder room, and laundry, featuring polished timber flooring to the entrance and hallway.
The second level comprises master bedroom with walk through robe to a generous size ensuite, study nook and powder room. The spacious light filled kitchen, dining and living area flows out to a sun drenched entertaining deck perfect for entertaining and relaxing with friends and family whilst taking in the lovely bay views.
Additional features include split system heating/cooling, dishwasher, plenty of storage throughout and double remote garage with internal access which can also be utilised as an undercover alfresco area with sliding doors leading out to the rear yard.
Set on a 432sqm approx. fully fenced allotment with ample room for a boat or caravan storage whilst offering a peaceful coastal lifestyle or a weekender/retreat makes this wonderful townhouse ideal for permanent or holiday living.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Address: Villa 107/2128 Phillip Island Tourist Road Cowes VIC 3922
Description:
LIFESTYLE OPPORTUNITY!!
An affordable investment opportunity, within the beautiful Ramada Resort located on pristine Phillip Island. An easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne. It consists of 2 spacious bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a bright and sunny open plan living, dining and kitchen. This Villa is uniquely situated in the prime location of the resort overlooking a farmland and opposite the Cafés and facilities.
This investment opportunity within the Resort will appeal to corporate couples, singles or families looking for a luxurious, relaxing, maintenance free getaway.
The resort offers a cafe/bar, indoor gym, games room and walking trails full of wildlife. Come and take a look and you will not be disappointed.
All of this is within a 10 minute drive to Cowes CBD, beautiful bay beaches and famous surf beaches.
